newsitem.title: USA: Thiokol sees Q4 EPS of $1.10-$1.15.
newsitem.headline: Thiokol sees Q4 EPS of $1.10-$1.15.

text.p: Thiokol Corp said Wednesday it expects earnings per share of $1.10 to $1.15 for the fiscal fourth quarter ending June 30.
The First Call consensus analysts' estimate is $0.99 a share.
Thiokol, a maker of solid propulsion systems for missiles, earned $0.71 a share in the year-ago fourth quarter.
The company said that barring major program disruptions or market changes, it expects this earnings growth trend to continue.
Thiokol today reported higher thirds quarter earnings despite a slight decline in revenues.
